item.description:
...you wouldn't like me when I'm angry. So come see The Incredible Hulk at 7:35 at the North Haven Showcase!

PRE-PARTY: If anyone wants to do dinner before, we're up for that. We can do New Haven or North Haven, whatever gets the most votes the firstest (more exciting food in New Haven, but would have to eat earlier since we're farther from theater).

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957

DIRECTIONS: 91 N to x9, left off the ramp onto Montowese, right at the first light onto Universal Drive, it's ahead about 0.6 mi. on your left.

If you want to arrange car-pools, chat about the event, etc, click here to visit the thread on the message board
item.name: Thu. 6/19 - Don't make me angry...
